comments: Collins (ATL) fails to fully clear the lane and he straddles the lane line for longer than three seconds without imminently actively guarding an opponent.
Hunter (ATL) brings his hand forward towards Herro's (MIA) side and immediately removes his hand as Herro begins his upward shooting motion.
Martin (MIA) jumps vertically and marginal contact occurs as Collins (ATL) cuts back towards the rim.  Martin cleanly blocks Collins' shot near the rim.
Martin (MIA) and Huerter (ATL) come together at the same spot and incidental contact occurs as they attempt to secure the loose ball.
Martin (MIA) is the last player to touch the ball before the ball goes out of bounds.  Possession is correctly awarded to Atlanta.
Tucker (MIA) and Collins (ATL) come together at the same spot and marginal contact occurs as Collins secures the ball.
Huerter (ATL) moves into Tucker's (MIA) body and initiates contact as Tucker is passing the ball.
Lowry (TOR) brings his arm forward towards Young's (ATL) path and marginal contact occurs on the perimeter.
Young (ATL) initiates contact with Martin (MIA), who has established a legal guarding position in his path.
Lowry (MIA) is already in Hunter's (ATL) path and is firming up when contact occurs.
Collins (ATL) jumps vertically and absorbs the contact from Butler (MIA) at the end of the drive.
Huerter (ATL) brings his arm forward and initiates contact with Herro (MIA) that affects his SQBR.
Tucker (MIA) pulls Collins' (ATL) shorts away from his body and restricts his ability to get to the pass.
Collins (ATL) jumps vertically and maintains a legal vertical position as he defends Butler's (MIA) driving shot attempt.
Lowry (MIA) places his hands to Bogdanovic's (MIA) side and marginal contact occurs as they move in the same direction during the inbound.
Young (ATL) slides his pivot foot during his up fake.
There is no conclusive camera angle that shows if Gallinari (ATL) steps out of bounds at the start of his drive.
Martin (MIA) jumps to the side of Gallinari (ATL) and avoids making contact with Gallinari during his jump shot attempt.
Collins (ATL) commits a take foul on Tucker (MIA).
